channel.title: -=-=Valderia=-=- PvP | Towny | Mods Needed | Admin Needed
channel.description:
[i][b]Hello! Welcome to Valderia. You probably aren't even reading the description. But anyway, If you are, hello! Welcome to Valderia. Oh wait, I already said that :P. Okay so I'm going to list you the commands and the perms for the commands. No donations are done! Oh and we need 2 Mods and 1 Admin!
--------------------------------
Ranks: [Member] [Moderator] [Admin] [SpecialGuy] [Co-Owner] [Owner].
Here is the nicknames for the ranks and what they stand for: (We get a lot of questions about it.)
[M] = Member
[M] = Moderator
[A] = Admin
[SG] = Special-Guy
[Co] = Co-Owner
[O] = Owner
--------------------------- Special Perms For Each Rank:
[M] = None
[M] = Tp and Gm
[A] = WorldEdit
[SG] = OP
[Co] = OP
[O] = OP
------------------------------- Rules:
Don't grief.
Don't steal.
Don't raid.
This is a fun server, be nice. -------------------------------
Towny Help:
If you want to make a new town you'll need to get 15,000$. We do have moneydrop so that won't be hard. After you get the money do /t new "name" in the territory you want it to be the spawn. To change the spawn to /t set townblock THEN /t setspawn. After you do that do /t deposit ($) then do /t claim to claim your territory. YOU CAN BUILD IN THE WILD, THIS SERVER DOESN'T SUCK LIKE THAT!
--------------------------------
Join now! mc-valderia.mooo.com
---------------------------------
Oh I almost forgot! The Applications for ranks!
---------------------------------
Mod App:
What servers are you mod on?
Are you experienced? If so tell how.
Do you have skype? Do you have a mic? What is your username?
When will you be active?
If an Admin is making fun of a Mod or a Member, what do you do?
----------------------------------------
Admin App:
Explain what your powers are.
What are your abilities?
Do you have skype? Do you have a mic, if so, tell me.
What servers are you staff on?
How active will you be?
We are only choosing the best! -----------------------------------------[/b][/i]

item.title: -=-=Valderia=-=- PvP | Towny | Mods Needed | Admin Needed
item.dc:creator: @dooperous dooperous
item.description:
@dooperous wrote:

[i][b]Hello! Welcome to Valderia. You probably aren’t even reading the description. But anyway, If you are, hello! Welcome to Valderia. Oh wait, I already said that :P. Okay so I’m going to list you the commands and the perms for the commands. No donations are done! Oh and we need 2 Mods and 1 Admin!

Ranks: [Member] [Moderator] [Admin] [SpecialGuy] [Co-Owner] [Owner].

Here is the nicknames for the ranks and what they stand for:
(We get a lot of questions about it.)

[M] = Member

[M] = Moderator

[A] = Admin

[SG] = Special-Guy

[Co] = Co-Owner

[O] = Owner

Special Perms For Each Rank:

[M] = None

[M] = Tp and Gm

[A] = WorldEdit

[SG] = OP

[Co] = OP

[O] = OP

Rules:

Don’t grief.

Don’t steal.

Don’t raid.

This is a fun server, be nice.

Towny Help:

If you want to make a new town you’ll need to get 15,000$. We do have moneydrop so that won’t be hard. After you get the money do /t new “name” in the territory you want it to be the spawn. To change the spawn to /t set townblock THEN /t setspawn. After you do that do /t deposit ($) then do /t claim to claim your territory. YOU CAN BUILD IN THE WILD, THIS SERVER DOESN’T SUCK LIKE THAT!

Join now! mc-valderia.mooo.com

Oh I almost forgot! The Applications for ranks!

Mod App:

We are only choosing the best!
